title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-6.22 - Garbage and refuse disposal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-6.22 - Garbage and refuse disposal

State Regulations
(a) Garbage and refuse shall be disposed of often enough to prevent the development
of objectionable odors and the attraction of insects and rodents. (b) Where garbage or refuse is burned on the
premises, it shall be done by controlled incineration in accordance with 6
NYCRR Parts
201, 219
and
222. Areas around incineration units shall be kept
clean and orderly. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-6.22

Repealed

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
